name: MW02 design armchair, handmade in France by french designer Olivier Santini

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Olivier SANTINI's "MW02" armchair is handcrafted in France.A numbered and signed piece. The sides are made of transparent glass, allowing it to blend seamlessly into any style of space. This subtle and airy armchair stands out as a modern and innovative work that will bring a harmonious touch to your environment. The transparent black TPU seat gives it a sophisticated character while ensuring unparalleled comfort and remarkable elegance. The translucent sides evoke a delicate weightlessness of the seat, which appears to navigate gracefully through space. Combining striking lightness with boldness, this armchair not only optimizes the furniture space but also infuses your space with a distinctive personality. A rare, unique piece, appealing to decorators and art enthusiasts in search of originality and exceptional pieces. The seating, crafted in black TPU, revolutionizes the furniture sector with its innovative design and unique aesthetics. It distinguishes itself through its durability. Olivier Santini was born in 1966. He has been drawing since childhood, prioritizing ideas and originality. During his student years, he developed a deep interest in aesthetics, graphic contours, and the properties of materials, while enjoying opportunities to interact and exchange ideas with art artisans. At the age of 20, he founded a group of marketing and design agencies, putting his experience and creativity at the service of clients, achieving immediate success. While analyzing furniture designs, he noticed a lack of variety, color, and uniqueness, leading him to create his own furniture collection. His goal was to create different, fun, and vibrant furniture with optimistic and refreshing colors that bring light and joy to both indoor and outdoor spaces. MIAW 2022 Design Award Winner.
